column4: Hello, last night I have browsing with Oneiric. Then I don't know why, Unity crashed (strange) and I do sudo reboot. After reboot, I enter my password in LightDM. Appear black screen with so many messages (just 0.5 second) and the appearance back to LightDM. I enter my password again but the condition is same. I have tried this for +- 10 times. How to fix this? Thank you.
can you log in with another user?
But appearance after login just a panel at top without any menu and any dash.
try to reset compiz config for that user
Unity DE is not appear, and maximum I can login to guest GNOME Classic only. But I want the complete one Unity. I don't know why my Unity become like this.
can you log in with gnome 3 shell, xfce or another desktop environment?
Just GNOME Classic in guest account.
but the other account is broken also for GNOME Classic?
do you know what problem I have? I don't know why this problem happened.
persistant. Another account shows only a bar on top but I can't access any menu.
thank you. I am opening your link.
I had similar issue when playing with Compiz Malsasa
hmmm, suddenly the Unity dead, no dock, no menu, like that?
